evidence_collection.quote_text: From this day forward, a new vision will govern our land. From this day forward, it’s going to be only America first. America first.

For too long, a small group in our Nation’s Capital has reaped the rewards of Government while the people have borne the cost. Washington flourished, but the people did not share in its wealth. Politicians prospered, but the jobs left, and the factories closed. The establishment protected itself, but not the citizens of our country. Their victories have not been your victories; their triumphs have not been your triumphs; and while they celebrated in our Nation’s Capital, there was little to celebrate for struggling families all across our land.

This American carnage stops right here and stops right now.

evidence_collection.quote_text: It’s time to begin moving toward a merit-based immigration system, one that admits people who are skilled, who want to work, who will contribute to our society, and who will love and respect our country.
evidence_collection.context_type: exclusionary objective based on criteria, implicitly fragmenting from current system

evidence_collection.context_type: justification for policy that leads to division or exclusion
